parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: Query parameters that can be used to pass through parameters to the underlying provider request by surrounding them with 'proxy' key

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The comma separated list of fields that will be returned in the response (if empty, all fields are returned)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter parameters that allow greater customisation of the list response

updated_after.description: Use a string with a date to only select results updated after that given date

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the results to fetch

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: The unified cursor

info.title: Documents
info.description: The documentation for the StackOne Unified API - DOCUMENTS

value.description: The file format of the file, expressed as a file extension
The category name for associating uploaded files.

source_value.description: The provider specific category for associating uploaded files, if provided, the value will be ignored.

value.description: Whether the file is confidential or not

name.description: The filename of the file to upload

file_format.description: The file format of the file

content.description: The base64 encoded content of the file to upload

path.description: The path for the file to be uploaded to

category.description: The category object for associating uploaded files. If both an ID and a name are provided, the ID takes precedence.

confidential.description: The confidentiality level of the file to be uploaded

name.description: The name associated with this file

description.example: This is the description associated to the file.

file_format.description: The file format of the file

path.description: The path where the file is stored

owner_id.description: The user ID of owner of this file

remote_owner_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the owner of this file

folder_id.description: The parent folder ID associated with this file

remote_folder_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the parent folder associated with this file

drive_id.description: The parent drive ID associated with this file

remote_drive_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the parent drive associated with this file

created_at.description: The created date of the file

updated_at.description: The last updated date of the file

name.description: The name associated with this folder

description.example: This is the description associated to the folder.

size.description: The size of this folder in bytes

path.description: The path where the folder is stored

owner_id.description: The user ID of owner of this folder

remote_owner_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the owner of this folder

parent_folder_id.description: The parent folder ID associated with this folder

remote_parent_folder_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the parent folder associated with this folder

drive_id.description: The parent drive ID associated with this folder

remote_drive_id.description: Provider's unique identifier of the parent drive associated with this folder

created_at.description: The created date of the folder

updated_at.description: The last updated date of the folder

id.description: The ID associated with this drive

name.description: The name associated with this drive

description.description: The description associated with this drive

created_at.description: The created date of the drive

updated_at.description: The last updated date of the drive
